articles.title: Committee to Remember Kim Il Sung Inaugurated in Austria
articles.content:
Committee to Remember Kim Il Sung Inaugurated in Austria 
    Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Austrian Committee to Remember President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Vienna on June 22.
 Max Verworner, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
 The committee decided to organize in cities and local areas such functions as film show, book and photo exhibition and release of bulletin to widely introduce the exploits of the President.

Anniversary of Venezuela's Independence Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Venezuela's Independence Celebrated
    Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Chollima House of Culture Thursday on the occasion of the 193rd anniversary of the independence of Venezuela.
 Present there were a vice-chairman and members of the DPRK-Venezuela Friendship and Cultural Association and working people in the city.    
 Speeches were made there and a message of greetings to the president of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela was adopted.
